title: Cosmic Reaver Sion
body:
Hey folks,

So this is just a quick (~30-45 mins maybe?) doodle I whipped up to propose an idea for Cosmic Reaver Sion. I was asking myself "who would fit the Cosmic Reaver theme," and truthfully, not a lot of champions stood out. Talon, Katarina, Irelia maybe. Then I came across Sion, and I realized how neat this kind of skin would look on him (not to mention he's in sore need of a new skin)!

Let's break down why this would be cool:

* **Sion desperately needs a new skin.**
* Cosmic Reaver could use a new skin, and it's a line that I could see expanded upon in marvelous ways.
* Q: Sion winds up a soul-shattering blow, rimmed with a gold indicator. As Sion charges his Q, **stars collect in the AoE, ending with a cataclysmic flash of light upon impact.**
* W: Sion activates his Soul Furnace, **pouring forth stars and nebulae,** shielding him from incoming damage.
* E: Sion's shouts alone can propel minions and slow enemy champions,** shrouding them in a haze of cosmic energies.**
* R: Calling upon the might of the cosmos, **Sion turns into a roaring comet**, hurtling down the lane (did you watch the Aurelion Sol trailer? Imagine that passing comet is Sion).
* Instead of Jarvan I's crown, Sion dons a golden mask, emphasizing his mouth/jaw. A ceremonial dagger older than time itself adorns Sion's head, piercing his cloak.
* Sion's crippled leg has been restored-- almost. Cosmic energies gleam and swirl, as the Undead Juggernaut restores himself with incomprehensible power.
* **Golden axe, bro. It's golden. It's an axe. 200% better than a regular axe. Plus this one's, like, been through space and time and stuff.**
* I highly recommend imagining Sion ulting down mid into a 1v5 while Elton John's Rocket Man plays.

**Anyways, this post isn't just about sharing my idea for Cosmic Reaver Sion. Y'all should chime in with any ideas you have personally for Cosmic Reaver skins! Thanks for reading.**

**EDIT: Remember to upvote if you like it, maybe we can convince the good folks at Riot to consider this skin! :-)**
